title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

title: Interstellar
description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

title: Parasite
description: A darkly comedic thriller about class struggle and social infiltration.

title: Joker
description: A gritty character study of the man who becomes the Joker.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage caused by Thanos.
